page.title: 05GREAT MEOLS:SCHOOL GOVERNORS
page.content: Interview-Mrs.Millward -Chairperson. 1:5:1985.Interviewers:{P.Chapman, {K.Phillips. "As a Parent Governor I have held office since October,1984.I became involved out of interest in the school, having served on the P.T.A. I enjoy being able to influence some of the things that go on in the school. I have previously been governor of both a Liverpool and a Welsh school. I think we should make suggestions to the Headteacher;he would be very glad to listen.We don't want to make any changes to the school, largely because we are happy with how it is run.The changes we have discussed have been carried out;parking outside school,closure of the annexe,and increased swimming time.At present we are trying to get more accomodation." { }
